page.title: 07LICHFIELD ADULT TRAINING CTR
page.content: {The Adult Training Centre} is situated in Cherry Orchard.It was built in 1968. The centre provides care & instruction for mentally handicapped persons between the ages of 16 & 65.It is one of 10 such centres in Staffordshire,provided by the County Council.This centre caters for 120 persons,both male & female. There are classes in woodwork,metal work & gardening for the men.Women learn sewing,hairdressing and general domestic and housewifery crafts.The trainees(as they are called)are encouraged to join in Sports Competitions;and dances,bingo,etc.are organised for their leisure time.The trainees are taken shopping on Saturday mornings to help them to cope with everyday problems.Some of the trainees live at home and some in a hostel.
